name: Gold Bond Ultimate Rough & Bumpy Skin Daily Therapy Skin Cream, 8 oz

reviews.name: Gold Bond Ultimate Rough & Bumpy Skin Daily Therapy Skin Cream, 8 oz
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this on my feet for a week or so and it's definitely helped make them softer. The only draw back is it smells like Crisco cooking oil. I'd recommend putting this on with gloves unless you want your hands smelling like you were just frying something.
reviews.title: Works great, smells .. interesting

reviews.name: Gold Bond Ultimate Rough & Bumpy Skin Daily Therapy Skin Cream, 8 oz
reviews.reviewText: The Gold Bond Cream did just what it said it would. My rough and bumpy skin is almost totally gone. For years I felt ashamed to show my arms and legs because of the red bumps and ingrown hairs. The cream is thick and somewhat sticky feeling for a few minutes, but my skin feels smooth and soft. I am 100% happy.
reviews.title: Love it!

reviews.name: Gold Bond Ultimate Rough & Bumpy Skin Daily Therapy Skin Cream, 8 oz
reviews.reviewText: I've had problems ith kp for years and this has been fantastic! Noticed results in 2 days!
reviews.title: Great lotion
